issues.title: Outdated Karpenter API version
issues.description: Document uses 'karpenter.sh/v1' API version. As of 2025, Karpenter v1 is stable but v1beta1 examples should be updated to v1 consistently throughout.
issues.recommendation: Verify all Karpenter examples use v1 API consistently. Update any v1beta1 references.

issues.title: Missing EKS Auto Mode limitations for GPU workloads
issues.description: Document states EKS Auto Mode fully supports GPU workloads but doesn't mention current limitations: Auto Mode doesn't automatically configure GPU-specific settings like NVIDIA device plugin, DCGM exporter, or GPU-optimized AMIs. These require manual configuration even in Auto Mode.
issues.recommendation: Add clarification that while EKS Auto Mode includes Karpenter, GPU-specific configurations (NVIDIA drivers, device plugins, monitoring) still require manual setup via custom NodeClass or GPU Operator.

issues.title: NVIDIA driver version may be outdated
issues.description: Document specifies NVIDIA driver version '550.127.05'. Need to verify this is current for 2025/2026 timeframe and compatible with latest GPU instances (H100, H200).
issues.recommendation: Update to latest stable NVIDIA driver version. For H100/H200 support, driver version 535+ is required. Consider using 'latest' or version 550.90.07+.

issues.title: Missing re:Invent 2025 EKS features
issues.description: Document mentions some re:Invent 2025 features but is incomplete. Missing: EKS Hybrid Nodes, EKS Pod Identity v2 improvements, enhanced CloudWatch Container Insights for GPU, and EKS Auto Mode support for Inferentia/Trainium.
issues.recommendation: Add section covering re:Invent 2025 announcements: 1) EKS Hybrid Nodes for on-premises GPU, 2) Enhanced Pod Identity with cross-account support, 3) Native Inferentia/Trainium support in Auto Mode, 4) CloudWatch GPU metrics integration.

issues.title: Incomplete Helm installation commands
issues.description: The 'EKS 기반 Agentic AI 플랫폼 간편 구축' section shows truncated Helm commands. The code block ends abruptly with 'helm repo add litellm' without completion.
issues.recommendation: Complete the Helm installation example with full commands for all components (kgateway, litellm, vllm, langfuse, KEDA).

issues.title: Missing security considerations for GPU workloads
issues.description: Document lacks security best practices specific to GPU workloads: container escape risks with GPU passthrough, multi-tenancy isolation with MIG, and securing model artifacts in S3.
issues.recommendation: Add security section covering: 1) Pod Security Standards for GPU pods, 2) Network policies for model serving, 3) S3 bucket policies for model storage, 4) IAM roles for GPU workloads, 5) MIG for multi-tenant isolation.
